about_the_game:
BECOME THE ULTIMATE RACING MERCENARY

Burnin' Rubber 6 brings the action with a variety of modes, from open-world exploration to intense sprint and circuit races. Battle relentless, aggressive AI opponents who will stop at nothing to stay ahead. Wield your arsenal of weapons to obliterate everything in your path. Sharpen your skills to compete once more in the Tournament of Champions!

FEATURES

  • Single Player Campaign: Start your adventure and enjoy hours of racing action!

  • 6 Open Worlds: Explore and take on special free-roaming challenges!

  • 60+ Tracks: Replay the classics, try new ones, or create your own!

  • Level Editor: Want to jump through a massive stack of red barrels? Let's do it!

  • 50+ Vehicles: We've got them all! Street racers, muscle cars, heavies, and fan favorites!

  • Collect and Unlock Skins: Customize your collection of cars!

  • 30+ Unique Weapons: Master powerful new weapons to annihilate your enemies!

  • Split-Screen Mode: Have a blast crushing your friends in explosive split-screen battles!

  • (Mini)Boss Battles: Push your skills to the limit in epic boss encounters.

  • Face off against another epic Xform End Boss in a thrilling showdown!

EXPLORE THE BURNIN' RUBBER WORLD

Race through bustling city streets, scorching deserts, abandoned harbors, and many other thrilling locations. Perform insane jumps, speed through time trials, and destroy all traffic in your way. Will you defeat all the secret bosses and change the fate of the world?

THE GARAGE

Discover cars like the Giant, Eagle, and DX Turbo, all revamped with a sleek new look. Craft new upgrades to make your cars faster, tougher, or able to carry more firepower. Give them a fresh coat of paint to be the coolest on the block. Never leave home without your guns, missile launchers, and shield generators. Speaking of which, each world has its own Safehouse for you to unlock and decorate. Use it as your base of operations.

PEDAL TO THE METAL

For the first time in the official series, we've implemented split-screen gameplay! Choose your ride, enter a tournament, and compete with your friends for the winner's trophy! And with the track editor, you can finally create your own sandbox of mayhem. No more restrictions, no more rules!

Take the wheel and blaze down the open road, feeling the thrill of high-speed chases and the rush of crushing your opponents. Get ready for an explosive ride!

A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER

The long-awaited conclusion to the Burnin' Rubber series is finally coming!

It’s true, we’ve made a lot of racing games, both good and bad, since we began this exhausting journey. For a long time, we thought Burnin’ Rubber 5 would be the last big one we’d ever make. But there were still so many awesome ideas we wanted to bring to life, and so much community feedback we had neglected. Better physics, car sounds, gameplay balancing, and of course, even more explosions—to name just a few.

Now, after more than 10 years, it's time to settle some unfinished business!

– Xform

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 with 2.8 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 970 or AMD equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 with 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 1070 or AMD equivalent

short_description: Burnin' Rubber 6 is an intense car-combat racing game where you race, drift, and blast through competitors in explosive battles. Explore the open world and customize your car collection to perfection. Become the ultimate racing mercenary! Includes split-screen multiplayer and a track editor!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Ukrainian, Polish, Russian, Czech, Turkish, Bangla, Hindi
